Headline: Male celebrities embracing polished nails
Article_Body: Although men have been painting their nails since ancient Babylonia, in the past few decades male musicians have spearheaded the use of nail polish and nail art. From David Bowie and Kurt Cobain, to Snoop Dog, and more recently Harry Styles and A$AP Rocky, male musicians have been unafraid to play with manicures. Click through the gallery to see more celebrities who have embraced the art of striking manicures. Harry Styles at London's O2 Arena.  Kurt Cobain in 1993. Brad Pitt at the Palm Springs International Film Festival Awards. Brad Pitt at the Palm Springs International Film Festival Awards. Bad Bunny accepting the Social Artist of the Year award during the 2019 Billboard Latin Music Awards. Johnny Depp at the premiere of the film "The Lone Ranger." Seal at the Star Event Centre in Sydney, Australia.
